story.text: NEW YORK Jan 3 Shares of Spectra Energy Corp. (SE.N) rose 2 percent Wednesday on the natural gas company's first day of trading on the New York Stock Exchange. Spectra's spin-off from Duke Energy Corp. (DUK.N) was completed on Jan. 2. Spectra shares gained 56 cents to $28.31, while Duke shares were up 13 cents, or 0.7 percent, to $19.27.
story.title: spectra energy up 2 pct on first day of trading
